As most of the crew waits at the Ark, or at least somewhat behind, Windlord=

and Ratrap begin the journey towards Hydras=92 black tower. Most of the tr=
ip
is largely uneventful. The duo passed over rivers, streams, mountains an=
d
even an ocean to get to their destination.

As they close in to perhaps w=
ithin 50 kilometers they can see the tall ebony
colored spire that is the d=
ark tower, jutting out of a large lake of glowing
red hot magma like some d=
ark fist of defiance; its dark well armored surface
glinting in the sun lik=
e well shined onyx.

As they get closer, perhaps within 20 kilometers, they=
 can see dots swooping
around the tower looking something like birds of pre=
y over a rabbit in the
fields. However the fields themselves are broken lan=
ds, rocks and stones
jutting out of a nearly featureless landscape.

As Win=
dlord and Rat Trap get a little closer they can see that the dots are
not b=
irds at all, but they are jets, each one of them an exact replica of
Scourg=
e! Five of them sweep through the skies their movements are a well
orchestr=
ated search pattern. Either they were looking for something, or
keeping an =
sensor open for anyone approaching. It was obvious that to
approach any fur=
ther in the open would risk detection.

*     *     *     *     *     *    =
 *     *     *

Meanwhile back at the Ark Rodimus nodded at Quickstride, hi=
s face obviously
troubled. There was a part of him that knew that he needed=
 to be here at the
Ark to protect it, yet another part of him wanted to be =
there where the
action was.

He glanced at his screens, =93I don=92t know q=
uickstride, maybe they do know of
our plan already and are just waiting for=
 us to fall into a trap they have
set.=94

(TAG)

Preston

--002215048ad337d9e20496348b9b
